#summary A gadget that generates a graph of your current biorhythms.

= Introduction =

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biorhythm Biorhythms] are based on the interactions of three different cycles:  

  * Physical, a 23-day cycle
  * Emotional, a 28-day cycle
  * Intellectual, a 33-day cycle

This is a simple gadget that graphs your biorhythm cycles over a 2-week period, centered around the current date.

= Installation =

To add this to your Google personalized homepage, click here:

[http://fusion.google.com/add?moduleurl=http://epicmedia-gadgets.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/biograph/biograph.xml http://buttons.googlesyndication.com/fusion/add.gif]

For a more esoteric look at biorhythms, you may want to check out the TodaysBiorhythmColor gadget.
